span.span: to have the Login server compare the iTimeWindow parameter against the time since the user last signed in; to have the Login server compare iTimeWindow against the last time the Ticket was refreshed.

span.span: Pass -1 to indicate that Passport should use the default value.

span.span: Pass -1 to indicate that Passport should use the default value.

span.span: A domain name space to which you want to direct users without Passports to register.

span.span: The specified name space must appear as a "domain name" entry in the Partner.xml Component Configuration Document (CCD).

param.span: L'espace de noms par défaut est généralement « passport.com ».

span.span: The typical default name space is "passport.com".

span.span: Pass -1 to indicate that Passport should use the default value.

span.span: Check the Passport Web site for updates on the status of SSL sign-in.

Pour plus d’informations sur l’utilisation de Windows Live ID pour authentifier les utilisateurs dans une application Web, consultez [Kit de développement logiciel de Windows Live ID](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).For more information about how to use Windows Live ID to authenticate users in a Web application, see [Windows Live ID SDK](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=106346).
